Whenever <CARDNAME> attacks, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

Whenever <CARDNAME> attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped, otherwise put it into your hand.

cards.rules_text:

When City Recovery Unit dies, rejuvenate 1 [i](Exile a card from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 1 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]

{2}: Hovering Gyrinus gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.rules_text:
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller exiles a card from their graveyard for each of those creatures.
At the beginning of your end step, if you activated two or more abilities that aren't mana abilities this turn, transform UX01 Consul U.

Vigilance
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant, transform Moebius U. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]

At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more equipped, or artifact creatures, transform UX02 Consul Q.
cards.rules_text2:
Ward—{2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, each opponent loses 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature card left your graveyard this turn, transform UX03 Consul V.
cards.rules_text2:
Whenever Moebius V attacks, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant, transform Moebius V. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Whenever UX04 Consul R deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have less than three cards in your hand, transform UX04 Consul R.
cards.rules_text2:
Whenever you cast a spell from exile, put a +1/+1 counter on Moebius R.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant, transform Moebius R. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever UX05 Consul G enters the battlefield or transforms into UX05 Consul G, it fights target creature an opponent controls.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with power three or greater, transform UX05 Consul G.
cards.rules_text2:
Trample

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you are stagnant transform Moebius G. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: You may play lands from your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We pooled our knowledge, and through time gave birth to a single point of hope... Origin. An ark, containing all the worlds' data, recorded in words of light, carrying hope into the future...”— Nia, Agnus Queen[/i]

cards.rules_text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Whenever you cast a spell, draw two cards.
At the beginning of your end step, discard your hand.

{2}{W}{W}{B}{B}: Destroy all permanents. Each player may put four lands destroyed this way onto the battlefield tapped.
{2}{W}{B}: Return RX08 Choose The Now from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed.
cards.flavor_text: [i]There are two roads set before every individual... The left and the right...[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
First strike, Deathtouch
Sacrifice M: Target creature you control gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
If M would be put into a graveyard from the battlefield, exile it instead.

cards.rules_text:
Indestructible
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: You may cast target Nopon card you own in exile without paying its mana cost.
Other Nopon you control get +1/+1 for each legendary creature you control.

cards.special_text:
[+2]: Mill two cards, then rejuvenate 2. If you play a land card from among the cards exiled this way you gain 3 life. [i](Exile two cards from your graveyard, then you may play a permanent card with mana value 2 or less from among them until end of turn.)[/i]
[-1]: Target land you control becomes a 0/3 green Plant creature. It's still a land.
[-6]: Until end of turn each creature you control has base power and toughness equal to the number of lands you control and gain trample.
cards.notes:
Heals and Rejuvenates
Cares about lands

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token with haste and “When this creature dies it deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls”.
[0]: Sacrifice an Elemental creature you control, MX04 Melia, Queen of Keves deals damage equal to that creature's power to target creature an opponent controls.
[0]: You may exile a creature card from your graveyard, if you do you gain life equal to its toughness.
[-3]: MX04 Melia, Queen of Keves deals damage to target player equal to the number of tapped creatures you control, you gain that much life.
cards.notes:
Summons Elements
Sacrifices them for damage

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you haven't played a land this turn, create a colorless Wastes land token with “{T}: Add {C}.”

{W}{U} ACTIVE AND CHANGE [/b]Control the game by using activated abilities and transforming permanents for extra value.
{U}{B} MILL You plan victory in the long run, hold your opponents down and leave them with no cards left to play.
{B}{R} FROM EXILE Cast spells from exile to outlast your foes by rejuvenating or winning battles.
{R}{G} HOLD THE FRONT LINE Gather power by winning battles and strike through your foes defenses with unstoppable creatures.
{G}{W} NOPON EXCHANGE Nopon are hardy, and will come back ready to fight again, don't be afraid to make trades early to win in the late game.[i]
{W}{B} [/i]REANIMATION Your strongest fighters get another chance at life through reanimation and rejuvenation.[i]
{B}{G} [/i]LEAVES THE GRAVEYARD The grave is a resource, repurpose what is there by turning it into tokens, counters, or more.[i]
{G}{U} [/i]VISTA RAMP Ramp into large creatures by playing extra lands, or once you're out of lands use that resource in other ways.[i]
{U}{R} [/i]EQUIPMENT/VEHICLES Fight your battles with skill and strategy, combine equipment and vehicles to always attack favorably.[i]
{R}{W} [/i]STAGNANT AGGRO[i] [/i]Attack early when its safe, then setup for a final victory strike.[i]
